main_definition: Clicks can refer to the sound made by a button when it is pressed or multiple actions of similar nature.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The act of pressing a mouse button, often resulting in an action being performed on a computer
meanings_and_examples.example: When I click the 'send' button to email my friends.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A sound produced by devices such as computers or cameras when buttons are pressed
meanings_and_examples.example: The camera makes a loud clicking noise every time you press the shutter button.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Social media interactions, specifically likes given on posts and photos
meanings_and_examples.example: I received 10 clicks on my Instagram post after sharing it with friends.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The act of choosing or selecting something from a set of options
meanings_and_examples.example: She clicked the 'yes' option when asked if she wanted to purchase the product.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An online advertisement that appears in response to specific user behaviors, often seen as banners on websites or social media
meanings_and_examples.example: I saw a new clicks ad for running shoes while browsing an e-commerce site.
